title: Chef client and node delete still error on `vagrant destroy` in 1.7.1
body:
There was an issue in 1.6.5 with deleting the client and node on vagrant destroy. A new issue happens now in 1.7.1

```
==> default: Deleting client "Glens-Air-2-aa84fd" from Chef server...
```
